hi i have a question: how do i install programs to ubuntu using a windows compatible install CD
how do i use a CD image?
can you run a .iso in ubuntu?
you can't "run" a .iso, but you can mount one and run executables that are on it
the folder to associate with the .iso
usually, it will be something like /media/whatever
once it is mounted, going into that directory will be like going into the image
there should be an installer somewhere in there that can be run in wine
you may need to use winecfg to make that mount point a temporary cd drive
the disk will be readable by ubuntu
and it should be automatically mounted to somewhere in /media
